text: Ceroplesis hamiltoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1915 and is known from Kenya.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis hamiltoni. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1915
title: Ceroplesis hamiltoni
